content: X-FCP-F Checker plate fastener (coated) Checker plate fastener disc for threaded studs in mildly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Duplex-coated disc provides corrosion resistance Locking tabs on the disc help to prevent self-loosening Non-slip disc surface Cordless solution Applications Fastening checker plate in mildly corrosive environments Fastening height of 5-13 mm For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Checker plate Approvals: ABS For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351 Technical Data | Application | Checker plate | Approvals | ABS | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351 | Corrosion protection | Duplex coating, equivalent to 45 Âµm hot-dip galvanized | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 1/4 in | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 308859 - Grating disc X-FCP-F 5/10 - Package Size 200 pc
